observation: I see a sign-up page with a residence selection form. There's a language overlay displayed with multiple language options and a close button (X) in the top right. I need to close this language overlay first before proceeding with the country/region selection.
reasoning: As a normal user, I would want to dismiss this language overlay that's blocking the main form so I can continue with the registration process. The close button is clearly visible.
ux_issues: Language overlay keeps appearing and blocking the main signup flow

outcome.visual_observation: The colorful overlay boxes and bounding rectangles that were present in the BEFORE screenshot have been removed in the AFTER screenshot. The interface now shows a clean, uncluttered view of the residence selection form without any visual debugging elements or overlays.
